file_content.text: Watcher Two to Cipher Nine. Link established with Mos Ila spaceport. Updating encryption protocols.
And... transmission secure. I assume the flight was uneventful?
I arrived in one piece. What's the mission?
Ready to go.
You're the first exciting thing here. Relieve my boredom?
[Flirt] Someone to talk to....
You might get more excitement than you like.
I have to say, I don't know much about the planet.
What is this place?
Not much of anything here, is there?
You're not kidding.
That's how it looks on the surface.
Tatooine's a desert world. Binary star system, minimal life-forms, sparsely populated by farmers and petty criminals. Mos Ila is the sole Imperial outpost.
Not normally somewhere we'd expect terrorists to congregate. But these are unusual terrorists--the ghost cell.
"Unusual" in what way? Methodology? Politics? Species?
What's special about them?
Methodology and function.
Go on.
Cute name. Did we come up with it, or did they?
Ooh. Spooky.
One of theirs. Not bad for propaganda.
Years ago, we heard rumors of a training program for hardened radicals--a terror cell specializing in stealth, infiltration and assassination.
Information now suggests this ghost cell is real--elite support for the Eagle's network.
Some lead, to bring the cell from "rumor" to priority one.
You sound surprised.
The attack on Dromund Kaas forced us to... re-examine our assumptions. Accept new possibilities.
What are these assassins capable of?
Tell me more about them.
There are stories of diplomats beheaded, security teams murdered... but no proof of terrorist involvement. It's troubling.
I fought ghosts in the Dark Temple. I'm not afraid of pretenders.
Not as elite as me.
Cipher, there were no, ah, ghosts in the temple. Rogue Force manifestations is all.
We're targeting Tatooine on the word of an anonymous source claiming to be a former ghost cell member.
The source says that stopping the terrorists is a "matter of conscience." He wants a face-to-face meeting.
I'll make contact. He shouldn't be hard to turn.
A potential defector....
Profiling agrees--seventy-four percent odds.
Don't worry. I can use a delicate touch.
I'll be gentle.
Yes. I quite remember that.
An anonymous source demands a meet? It doesn't inspire faith.
Sounds like a trap.
What he's given us checks out, and we can't ignore this.
Soothe his paranoia and dispose of him when you've eliminated the cell. He's waiting for a call from a holocom terminal in town.
Stay on guard; Watcher Two out.
Darth Zhorrid had me run an errand here. I'm getting used to this planet.
I can't get away from this.
I... didn't realize you were personally serving Zhorrid. Apologies.
Mercifully short.
